name: Tuition-Free Programs
description: Tuition-free music programs that address critical community needs. - YOUNG MUSICIANS PROGRAMS - Students are nominated by their public school teacher audition each Spring for the following academic year. If accepted, students are eligible for a full scholarship that provides students with weekly free private instrumental lessons, theory, musicianship and ensemble classes for the academic year. The YMP program focuses on serving middle and high school students from low-income San Francisco househ
